Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | History | Music
Status: New Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 90 Minutes
Premiere: February 04, 2013

Dancing On The Edge is a drama series broadcast on BBC TWO. The series is set during the early 1930s and follows the fortunes of a black jazz band in London during times of extraordinary change. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34274)
